description: Weighted estimate of asthma prevalence among adults, as a percentage.
Lower bound of the 95% confidence interval calculated for the percent asthma prevalence
Upper bound of the 95% confidence interval calculated for the percent asthma prevalence.

Lifetime asthma prevalence includes adults who report that they have ever been diagnosed with asthma. Current asthma prevalence includes adults who report that they have ever been diagnosed with asthma AND that they still have asthma at the time of the survey.
